Posts.Content: May 12, 2009 09:49PM megancathleen wrote: I'm paying out-of-pocket for Tykerb right now ($3600/mo) while I fight with my insurance co. for coverage.  My oncologist gave me a "free" unopened bottle that had been donated by a family of a patient who didn't get a chance to use it.  So it seems like you should be able to donate it.  Also, if you feel comfortable doing so, I would appreciate the donation and could provide you my address.  Either way, thanks for not just throwing it out!  Someone can definitely use it! :)
Posts.Title: Tykerb YHong megancathleen
